definition[0]: the name and address that is printed at the top of a sheet of writing paper
definition[1]: paper that has the name and address of a person or business printed at the top of it
example[0]: The letter had been written on university letterhead.
definition[2]: the name and address of a person or business printed at the top of paper used for writing letters
example[1]: An elegant letterhead is a sign of success.
definition[3]: paper with the name and address of a person or business printed on it
example[2]: Would you please print out the memo on letterhead?
